LanguageData.PsychicEntropyGain.label: arcane load gain
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyGain.description: A multiplier on arcane load gained from any source.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.label: magical aptitude
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.description: People with a higher magical aptitude suffer more from negative arcane effects, and benefit more from positive ones due to their deeper connection to the ambient mana field. Higher magical aptitude also increases arcane load limit.
LanguageData.AnimalsLearningFactor.label: animal handling learning factor
LanguageData.AnimalsLearningFactor.description: A multiplier on the learning rate for animal handling skill.
LanguageData.MeditationFocusGain.label: meditation mana gain
LanguageData.MeditationFocusGain.description: The amount of mana a person gains per day of meditation, ignoring bonuses from focus objects.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMax.label: arcane load limit
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMax.description: The maximum amount of arcane load an individual can tolerate safely.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRate.label: arcane load recovery rate
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRate.description: The rate at which this person dissipates arcane load.
